content.body: Yoav Weiss: annevk: if it's not too much trouble, I tend to agree a renaming of the feature would be nice, to enhance clarity in e.g. ChromeStatus and any blog posts or web developer documentation that gets produced. "Multiple import maps" or "Updateable import maps" maybe.
content.formatted_body: Yoav Weiss: annevk: if it's not too much trouble, I tend to agree a renaming of the feature would be nice, to enhance clarity in e.g. ChromeStatus and any blog posts or web developer documentation that gets produced. "Multiple import maps" or "Updateable import maps" maybe.
